location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

mods.abstract: The letter states that another letter for the Vakeel (referring to Karim Khan) is enclosed and requests for it to be translated into Persian and delivered to Shiraz. Other matters in this regard are discussed and it is stated that a letter for the council in Bombay is enclosed. Neither the letter for Karim Khan nor the letter for the council are enclosed.
